statements: SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_status <> 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_orders, order_status FROM Orders GROUP BY order_status HAVING total_orders > 5
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'Pending'
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, expected_delivery_date FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit'
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_status='processing';
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT o.customer_name, s.shipment_date FROM Orders o INNER JOIN Shipments s ON o.order_id = s.order_id WHERE s.shipment_status='delivered';
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS order_count FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_name HAVING order_count > 2;
SELECT customer_name, MAX(order_date) AS latest_order_date FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY latest_order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_id = 25;
SELECT order_id, order_status, order_timestamp FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY order_timestamp DESC;
SELECT order_id, shipment_status, estimated_delivery_date FROM Shipments WHERE order_id = 50;
SELECT tracking_id, current_location, last_update FROM OrderTracking WHERE shipment_id = 100 ORDER BY last_update ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_status, order_timestamp, shipment_id, shipment_status FROM Orders JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT order_id, order_status FROM Orders WHERE order_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, shipment_status FROM Orders JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Shipments.shipment_status, OrderTracking.current_location FROM Orders JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id JOIN OrderTracking ON Orders.order_id = OrderTracking.order_id;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'completed' AND order_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT item_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items WHERE order_id = 12345;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, carrier_name FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT tracking_id, event_date, event_description FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_id = 54321 ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_status FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT orders.order_id, order_items.product_name, order_items.quantity FROM orders JOIN order_items ON orders.order_id = order_items.order_id WHERE orders.customer_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND order_status = 'Completed';

SELECT orders.order_id, shipments.shipment_date, shipments.carrier_name, shipment_tracking.event_date, shipment_tracking.event_description FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id JOIN shipment_tracking ON shipments.shipment_id = shipment_tracking.shipment_id WHERE shipments.carrier_name = 'UPS';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, delivery_date, order_status FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM Customers;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category, product_price FROM Products;
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, shipment_date, delivery_status FROM Shipments;
SELECT order_id, shipment_id, status_message, status_date FROM DeliveryStatus;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_date FROM Orders WHERE order_status = 'shipped';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, shipment_id, status_message FROM DeliveryStatus WHERE status_date >= '2022-01-01';
